definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: A domain name is divided into three segments and separated by periods.
sentences.chinese: 一个域名名称分三部分并由句点号分隔开。

sentences.english: Without the preceding slash, the period alone means any character.
sentences.chinese: 如果前面没有反斜杠，单独一个句点代表任意字符。

sentences.english: It also contains a lot of files and folders which are preceded by a full-stop.
sentences.chinese: 它也包含许多句点在前的文件和文件夹。

sentences.english: The most common of these characters is the period.
sentences.chinese: 这些最常用的句子结束字符是句点。

sentences.english: The Peach Blossom Fan story hasn't started yet, I will ring end.
sentences.chinese: 桃花扇里的故事还没开始，我便圈上了句点。

sentences.english: The sequence of the name spaces depends on the number of periods in the name.
sentences.chinese: 名字空间的序列取决于名字中句点的数量。

sentences.english: Double-click that method and type another period.
sentences.chinese: 双击该方法并键入另一个句点。

definition: the curtain drops/the end of the show
to wind up/to bring to an end/to finish
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
The End (appearing at the end of a movie etc)
thick and heavy in colors/to describe sth in colorful language with attention to detail (idiom)
